metaTags.metaDescription: The Pro Plan is for professional websites, blogs, and portfolios requiring basic security and performance. See what is included with Cloudflare's Pro Plan.

relatedBlades.title: Get started like a Pro for only $20/month
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare Pro is best suited for professional websites, blogs, and startups requiring basic security and performance.

relatedBlades.title: Protect & accelerate your site like a Pro with Cloudflare's:

features.title: One-click bot mitigation
features.description: Protect your site from pesky bots with Cloudflare's Super Bot Fight Mode! View detailed analytics that are updated in real-time from the Cloudflare dashboard.

features.title: Best-in-class Web Application Firewall (WAF)
features.description: Protect your site with Cloudflare's easy-to-use WAF. Build firewall rules with ease or leverage pre-configured, regularly updated rule sets.

features.title: The world's #1 ranked Content Delivery Network (CDN)
features.description: Accelerate your website with our %{DataCenterCount}+ network locations worldwide. We route your traffic to our closest location, ensuring lightning-fast page load times.

features.title: One-click lossless image optimization
features.description: Improve page load times using Cloudflare Polish, with an average file size reduction of 21%.

features.title: Unmatched DDoS mitigation
features.description: Protect your site with the world's #1 ranked DDoS mitigation solution. Enjoy extended analytics and DDoS alerts.

features.title: The world's fastest DNS resolver
features.description:
Leverage the world's fastest and most private DNS resolver: 1.1.1.1 
We will never sell your data or use it to target you with ads. Period.

features.title: Accelerated mobile page load speed
features.description: Accelerates image delivery for your visitors based on their device. Cloudflare Mirage detects screen size and connection speed to optimally deliver images for the current browser window.

features.title: Free SSL certificate
features.description: Secure the transfer of data between you and your website visitors instantly, with a free shared SSL certificate from Cloudflare.

features.title: Privacy-first analytics
features.description: Extended access to robust analytics on your websites traffic and data transfer.

slides.title: E-commerce Store
slides.copy: Speed up and protect your e-commerce site with Cloudflare's vast network of data centers. Cloudflare's network is within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from 95% of the world's Internet-connected population. Your site's content is routed to the closest data center to your customer resulting in extremely fast load times. Shopify uses Cloudflare to protect and secure its eCommerce SaaS!

slides.title: JAMStack Site
slides.copy: Kick-off your JAMStack site the right way. By leveraging the benefits of Cloudflare, you'll have all the basics you need to get started.

slides.title: Professional Blog
slides.copy: Eliminate slow load time for your readers using Cloudflare's massive content delivery network.

slides.title: Web Applications
slides.copy: Protect & speed up your web applications absolutely free. Kick off your next project without worrying about DDoS attacks and data breaches!

slides.title: SaaS Platform
slides.copy: Cloudflare's primary focus is security, performance, and reliability which are key components to keeping your platform up and running. Join 1000's of SaaS companies and protect and accelerate your platform today!

slides.title: API Endpoints
slides.copy: By using the world's largest global Anycast network you can secure all your API endpoints with ease.

relatedBlades.title: Is Cloudflare Pro for you?
relatedBlades.copy: With the Cloudflare Pro plan, you receive upgraded DDoS Mitigation, CDN, DNS, Shared SSL certificates absolutely free. The Pro plan also features our one-click bot mitigation, advanced Web Application Firewall (WAF) with 20 Page Rules, lossless image optimization, automatic mobile optimization, extended security analytics, and much more. Take your professional website to the next level with Cloudflare Pro.

relatedBlades.quote: "Just as Canva simplifies graphic design, Cloudflare simplifies performance and security. Thanks to Cloudflare, we can focus on growing our product and expanding into new markets with confidence, knowing that our platform is fast, reliable, and secure."

relatedBlades.title: Add-ons to take your site to the next level

content.value: Argo is a service that uses optimized routes across the Cloudflare network to deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely. Argo includes: Smart Routing and Tiered Caching.
Rate Limiting protects against denial-of-service attacks, brute-force password attempts, and other types of abusive behavior targeting the application layer.

Load Balancing safeguards from service disruptions with local and global traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover, ensuring the continuous availability of your critical resources.
Cloudflare Workers lets developers deploy serverless code written in JavaScript, Rust, C, and C++ to Cloudflare's edge, closer to the end user.
Cloudflare Stream makes streaming high quality video at scale, easy and affordable.
Cloudflare Access protects internal resources by securing, authenticating and monitoring access per-user and by application.
Zero Trust security for Internet browsing.

learnMoreLink.elementName: AddOn- Plans: Cloudflare Gateway w/features-Learn more

content.value: You pay what we pay â€” you won't find better value. Cloudflare Registrar securely registers and manages your domain names with transparent, no-markup pricing that eliminates surprise renewal fees and hidden add-on charges.
